subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dustin Pedroia hit a three-run double as the Boston Red Sox followed an overturned triple-play call with seven runs in the seventh inning to beat Minnesota, 18-5.
snippet: Dustin Pedroia hit a three-run double as the Boston Red Sox followed an overturned triple-play call with seven runs in the seventh inning to beat Minnesota, 18-5.
